level.heading: DISPOSITIVE MOTION IN LIEU OF REPORT (ยง 27-306)

level.text: In lieu of filing the Agency Report, the contracting agency may file a dispositive motion with the Board and serve it on all parties. If the motion is filed and denied by the Board in whole or in part, the Agency Report shall be filed no later than ten (10) days after receipt of the Board’s ruling or within a lesser period as the Board may order.
